The Best Weather Forecast in Your Pocket

We no longer have to wait until a woman appears on a TV screen to forecast the weather for tomorrow. Now we are lucky to save a good deal of time and not wait for the end of some cough syrup promotion to find out the weather in our region. Today it takes less than a second to check out the latest updates of weather forecast looking at your phone screen. Due to simplicity and availability of a meteo widget we are never caught off-guard by the sudden downpour.

Simple and Full-Sized Weather Widgets with Legible Text

So, you are reading some article on a blog and notice a new weather widget with the latest forecast. This little detail makes you feel cared about because the author of the blog made an effort to place a free widget clima with a readable text info on the website. Thus, you won’t have to leave the website to check out the latest weather news when you see the sky getting grey. However, it’s important to choose the right temperature widget for website with the highest readability rate so that visitors won’t have to look for a top quality weather forecast on a different blog or site. Additionally, do not forget that professionally developed live weather widgets depend on the well-thought weather code text.

The Main Features of WeatherBug Widget

When you thought that a widget couldn’t be more improved, you suddenly found an animated WeatherBug Widget with pleasant texts and icons. For those who aren’t familiar with WeatherBug plugin we offer the most accurate weather app that is powered by a professional world-famous weather network. Ultimately, this widget has some new awesome features:

●You can receive real-time weather forecast and conditions from current period to 10 days.

●All the weather maps are animated and adjust to your favorite locations.

●You can receive the fastest severe weather alerts that also involve watches and warnings of 2 types NWS and NOAA.

The Benefit of Weather Plugin on Your Website

The main benefit of a HTML meteo widget on your site is that it fits your design because there are so many types of them. Besides, having a weather web widget can actually retain your visitors because you will exceed their expectations. With its help, you can create the best experience and make users stay longer on your website. It will also increase your website’s engagement rates and improve relationship between your brand and a prospect. Besides, creating the positive experience you also encourage customers to be more loyal to your service. It’s all about the care and comfort you provide with a live weather widget for website that has no commercial message behind it.

Free Weather Channel Widget for Website

If you want to insert temperature HTML code on your page, we have a great solution for you. Our free weather plugin for website is:

● fast;

● easy-to-use;

● accurate.

It provides the current temperature for both local and worldwide cities. You can also add an attractive free weather sticker for website, change its design so that it will suit the pages. Our plugin is absolutely free, so you can place it on the web page and take advantage of the numerous colour themes available.

How It Works

Our weather radar widget for website is always actual and provides the most up-to-date information available. It shows meteo conditions both in local city and the destination that you choose. Our app is a dynamic weather widget that generates forecast independently using precise data sources. The clima gadget integrates with a blog or site. The data is taken from our servers online and transferred to a web page, so that the information updates automatically. The weather script for website in this plugin was written using Javascript, HTML5 and CSS3. Besides, it lets customize the current weather widget with different themes that will certainly fit your blog or website.

Google Friendly Weather Widget for Your Website

If you embed the iframe weather widget on your website, blog or single web page, you will provide visitors with more great features to choose from. Being a piece of useful content, the weather feed brings many advantages to your website. And it is not a secret, that the quality content is one of the most important things for the best ranking in Google or Bing.

If you download a custom weather widget and implement it into your pages, visitors of your site will receive more useful content thus you will attract more traffic. For that matter, our app is a Yahoo and Google weather widget for website in the sense that it makes your landing page more useful for visitors, and thus for the search engines:

● Google;

● Yahoo;

● Bing;

● Yandex.

HTTPS Weather Widget

Now many sites move to HTTPS to make the pages secured. It also helps to build user trust, to prevent tampering by third parties and of course, to increase in positions in search engine machines. So one more advantage of our weather widget is that you can install it even if your website has moved to HTTPS.

Simple and Accurate Forecast

Nowadays looking up the weather is a common thing that the majority of us do every day. Our cool weather widget makes this task even more convenient and simple. If you install this awesome meteo plugin, visitors will have a good experience and receive a reason to come back and use the app for their daily need in weather forecast. Thus, they will spend more time on your website.

Weather Widget for Blogger, Wordpress, Joomla, Drupal

Our free customizable weather widget offers you a wide choice of colourful themes, so you could definitely find the most suitable one for your site. You can choose the design of the app, change its size and easily embed it on your page. These weather plugins are also cool because they can be installed and work properly regardless of the type of CMS you are using: Wordpress or Blogger, Joomla or Drupal. Feel free to embed the widget on all of them.

How to Embed Weather Forecast in Web Page

With our easy embed weather widget adding weather on your site is a simple deal. It takes only a few steps to do it. You don’t need to look for weather widget url to find out how to download this plugin. When you press the button “Get HTML code”, you will see the instruction that simply explains how to add the meteo app on your website. So your first step is to highlight the code shown in the frame. Next thing you do is copy and paste the following code into the back end of your site and that’s all there is to it. The weather widget appears on the page. You don’t even need to update it because everything is done automatically. So benefit with our free and easy embeddable weather widget for website, creating a pleasant experience for your visitors.
